name: Realms of Ropasci
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD - move camera

QE - Rotate camera around island

Left Click - Select Castle(While hovering over castle) / Give Command (While castle is selected)

Right Click - Deselect Castle

Eliminate all enemy factions to win the game! Post your seed/map shape combo if you found one that was fun!

Try the windows build for faster load times.

Music Used:

Mysterious Piano Music and Epic Orchestra Music by Migfus20
